org.wtc.eclipse.platform.helpers
Interface IAntHelper

public interface IAntHelper

Helper to execute Ant scripts.

Method Summary
 void executeExternalAntFile(IUIContext ui, java.io.File antFile, java.lang.String target, java.lang.String... targetArgs)
          executeExternalAntFile - Create a system process to execute an Ant build file at the given arbitrary location.

Method Detail

executeExternalAntFile

void executeExternalAntFile(IUIContext ui,
                            java.io.File antFile,
                            java.lang.String target,
                            java.lang.String... targetArgs)
executeExternalAntFile - Create a system process to execute an Ant build file at the given arbitrary location.

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input
antFile- - The file representation of the ant script to execute
target - - The target in the Ant file to execute
targetArguments - - Up to 10 additional arguments may be provided to the Ant file

executePluginAntFile

void executePluginAntFile(IUIContext ui,
                          Plugin plugin,
                          IPath antFilePath,
                          java.lang.String target,
                          java.lang.String... targetArgs)
executePluginAntFile - Create a system process to execute an Ant build file at the given location in the given plugin.

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input
plugin - - The plugin containing the Ant file to execute
antFilePath - - The plugin-relative path of the Ant file to execute.
Ex: /resources/testfiles/AntTest/subfolder/build.xml
target - - The target in the Ant file to execute
targetArguments - - Up to 10 additional arguments may be provided to the Ant file

executeWorkspaceAntFile

void executeWorkspaceAntFile(IUIContext ui,
                             IPath antFilePath,
                             java.lang.String target,
                             java.lang.String... targetArgs)
executeWorkspaceAntFile - Create a system process to execute an Ant build file at the given workspace location.

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input
antFilePath - - The full path (project name included) of the Ant file in the workspace to execute.
Ex: /RuntimeTestProject/subfolder/build.xml
target - - The target in the Ant file to execute
targetArguments - - Up to 10 additional arguments may be provided to the Ant file
